item.description:
Friends gathered at the Peace Abbey once more, and we shared our feelings and hopes around Sack's work, The Dignity of Difference.

For our upcoming meeting (June 1st) we have the following items:

Choose our next book (bring all your suggestions and all your creativity)

How to proceed during the summer months (meet once a month, take a break for the summer, etc...)

Given the fact that Fr. Carl moved to New Jersey, is any of you willing to assist me (sometimes I may be out of town) in following these meetings? Any volunteer?

Enjoy today's fantastic weather... and to all of you.... HAPPY MOTHER'S DAY!

PEACE
Fr. Joe Matteucig
St. Francis Xavier Missionaries
item.how_to_find_us: We are on Route 16, close to the Library and Town Hall Complex of Sherborn.
item.name: The Interfaith Book Club May/June Meeting
